items.title: Stock markets fall after US tariffs spark trade war fears
items.description: Stock markets in the US, Asia and the UK dip after Trump tariffs kicked in and spark retaliation.

items.title: Ukraine's shock over US military aid pause
items.description: One Ukrainian politician urged Trump "not to play with these dangerous issues because we're talking about lives".

items.title: One-year-olds among those raped during Sudan civil war, UN says
items.description: Children as young as one have been subjected to horrific sexual violence, a UN report finds.

items.title: What pause in US military aid could mean for Ukraine
items.description: It's a bitter blow for Ukraine and Europe - but not the first time the US has withheld aid, writes BBC's Jonathan Beale.

items.title: Gazans face tough choices as their future is debated on the global stage
items.description: Their fate is the discussion of Arab leaders in Egypt but what do Gazans want for their future?
